definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: "Aarhus Convention" is the milestone of environmental information disclosure system.
sentences.chinese: 《奧胡斯公約》是環境信息公開制度發展的里程碑。

sentences.english: The aid organization People to People, based in the city of Århus, is looking for a president.
sentences.chinese: 總部設在奧胡斯的援助組織“人與人”需要一名主席。

sentences.english: A few weeks ago I went around Aarhus University Park to take some photos.
sentences.chinese: 前幾個星期我在奧胡斯大學校園拍照。

sentences.english: The park is one of my favourite places in Århus.
sentences.chinese: 校園是我在奧胡斯的地方里我最喜歡的。

sentences.english: Kresten's grandparents live in Aarhus, a city 300km north of Copenhagen.
sentences.chinese: 克軒的外公外婆住在離哥本哈根300公里奧胡斯。
